Entry.JapaneseText: なあ、男と女が口をきいちゃいけないって、 不便だと思わないか、<Veigue>。
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, don't you think it's inconvenient that men and women can't talk to each other, <Veigue>?

Entry.JapaneseText: だってよー、クレアさんと口きいちゃいけないって 言われたらどうする？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I mean, what would you do if you couldn't talk to Claire?

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアは家族だ。 家族は口をきいてもいいはずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Claire is family. You should be able to talk to your family members.

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか、なるほどね！ おまえにとって クレアさんは妹みたいなもんなんだな。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, I see! You see Claire as something like your little sister.
